greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Square array A(n,k), n >= 1, k >= 0, read by antidiagonals: A(n,k) = Sum_{d|n, n/d==1 (mod 4)} d^k - Sum_{d|n, n/d==3 (mod 4)} d^k.
link: Index entries for sequences mentioned by Glaisher
formula: G.f. of column k: Sum_{j>=1} j^k*x^j/(1 + x^(2*j)).
mathematica: Table[Function[k, SeriesCoefficient[Sum[j^k x^j/(1 + x^(2 j)), {j, 1, n}], {x, 0, n}]][i - n], {i, 0, 12}, {n, 1, i}] // Flatten
program: for(n=1, 10, for(k=0, 8, print1(T(n, k), ", ")); print); \\ _Andrew Howroyd_, Nov 26 2018
results.author: _Ilya Gutkovskiy_, Nov 26 2018
